org.epzilla.leader.message
Class RmiMessageClient

java.lang.Object
  org.epzilla.leader.message.RmiMessageClient

public class RmiMessageClient
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to send RMI messages to other nodes and dispatchers.

Author:
Harshana Eranga Martin mailto: harshana05@gmail.com
